original_text: But there rose up certain of the sect of the Pharisees which believed, saying, That it was needful to circumcise them, and to command them to keep the law of Moses.
korean_text: 바리새파 중에 어떤 믿는 사람들이 일어나 말하되 이방인에게 할례를 행하고 모세의 율법을 지키라 명하는 것이 마땅하다 하니라

sentences.original_text: But there rose up certain of the sect of the Pharisees
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 바리새인파 중 어떤 사람들이 일어나서

sentences.original_text: saying, That it was needful to circumcise them
and to command them to keep the law of Moses
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 모세의 율법을 지키도록 명령해야 한다고
